title: why dont you people jayce in silver?!
body: ive recently bought jayce and.....hes strong as fuck.. brutalizer, tear, and he can clear waves like no tomorow, harass, 2v1..... i have yet to have a bad game with him... ive done so well ive had 3 people camp my lane cus of how behind their mid laner was..... even as adc he does really well! why doesnt anyone use him?! freelo for me !
